title: Whispers of Zukarath
description: Follow the guidance of the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
offerText: Begin your journey with the Zukran Masters.
acceptedText: You have accepted the Journey of Whispers.
activeText: Continue your trials with the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
completionText: You have completed the Journey of Whispers, you are now a full member of the Zukaran Order of Magi!

title: Enter Zurath
description: Begin your journey by entering Zurath and speaking to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
offerText: Whispers yet echo, and your fate has arrived. You must Enter Zurath to begin your Journey.
acceptedText: You have accepted the Journey of Whispers. Sehnrhyx Syliri will guide you to begin your Journey.
activeText: P: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to start your trials.
completionText: Your training has gone well, you are deemed worthy! You may now enter Zurath to begin your journey on the Path of Whispers.

tasks.title: Setting Forth
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri about your Journey.
tasks.offerText: Offer: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri about your Journey.
tasks.acceptedText: Accepted: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri about your Journey.
tasks.activeText: C: I'm glad to see you, I hope you have prepared well for your journey!
tasks.completionText: Your have spoken with Sehnrhyx Syliri, he has deemed you worthy for the Path of Whispers.

title: Vestments of the Order
description: Venture into Zurath and defeat the guardian to claim your Vestment of Zukarath.
offerText: Venture into Zurath and defeat the guardian to claim your Vestment of Zukarath. Will you take this challenge?
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to claim the Vestment of Zukarath.
activeText: Continue your journey to defeat the guardian and claim the Vestment of Zukarath.
completionText: You have earned the Vestment of Zukarath by your valor!

tasks.title: First Descent
tasks.description: Desc: Delve down to the third tier of Zurath.
tasks.offerText: Offer: Descend to Tier 3 of Zurath.
tasks.acceptedText: Accepted: Descend to Tier 3 of Zurath.
tasks.activeText: Active: Descend to Tier 3 of Zurath.
tasks.completionText: Completion: You have reached Tier 3.

tasks.title: Battle Tested
tasks.description: Defeat the Guardian.
tasks.offerText: Defeat the Guardian on Tier 3.
tasks.acceptedText: Defeat the Guardian on Tier 3.
tasks.activeText: Defeat the Guardian on Tier 3.
tasks.completionText: Tier 3 Guardian Defeated.

tasks.title: Vested Acolyte
tasks.description: Recover a Vestment of Zukarath.
tasks.offerText: Find the Vestment of Zukarath on Tier 3.
tasks.acceptedText: Find the Vestment of Zukarath on Tier 3.
tasks.activeText: Find the Vestment of Zukarath on Tier 3.
tasks.completionText: You have claimed your Vestment of Zukarath.

tasks.title: Triumphant Return
tasks.description: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to report your success.
tasks.acceptedText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to report your success.
tasks.activeText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to report your success.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

title: Sigil of the Order
description: Seek the Sigil of Zukarath to solidify your place among the Zukarrii.
offerText: Seek the Sigil of Zukarath to prove your worth. Will you accept this challenge?
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to claim the Sigil of Zukarath.
activeText: Continue your journey to claim the Sigil of Zukarath.
completionText: You have earned the Sigil of Zukarath through your valor.

tasks.title: Delving Deeper
tasks.description: Delve down to the sixth tier of Zurath.
tasks.offerText: Descend to Tier 6 of Zurath.
tasks.acceptedText: Descend to Tier 6 of Zurath.
tasks.activeText: Descend to Tier 6 of Zurath.
tasks.completionText: You have reached Tier 6.

tasks.title: Guardian’s Bane
tasks.description: Defeat the guardian on Tier 6.
tasks.offerText: Defeat the guardian on Tier 6.
tasks.acceptedText: Defeat the guardian on Tier 6.
tasks.activeText: Defeat the guardian on Tier 6.
tasks.completionText: Tier 6 Guardian Defeated.

tasks.title: Claim the Sigil
tasks.description: Recover a Sigil of Zukarath.
tasks.offerText: Recover a Sigil of Zukarath.
tasks.acceptedText: Recover a Sigil of Zukarath.
tasks.activeText: Recover a Sigil of Zukarath.
tasks.completionText: You have claimed the Sigil of Zukarath.

tasks.title: Enter the Depths
tasks.description: Descend to Tier 7 and report your findings.
tasks.offerText: Descend to Tier 7 and report your findings.
tasks.acceptedText: Descend to Tier 7 and report your findings.
tasks.activeText: Descend to Tier 7 and report your findings.
tasks.completionText: The way to Tier 7 is blocked by a magical barrier. You had better let Sehnrhyx Syliri know.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri with the Sigil.

title: Seeking Corruption
description: Seek out the corruption within Zurath’s depths.
offerText: Seek out the corruption within Zurath’s depths. Will you accept this challenge?
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to seek out the corruption.
activeText: Continue your journey to seek out the corruption in Zurath’s depths.
completionText: With shards you gathered I will activate and cleanse this old portal, to aid you in your investigation of this corruption.

tasks.title: Prepare for the Depths
tasks.description: You must use the Stone of Veil Piercing to bypass the magical barrier and reach Tier 7.
tasks.offerText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to prepare for the depths.
tasks.acceptedText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to prepare for the depths.
tasks.activeText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to prepare for the depths.
tasks.completionText: Use the Stone when you are ready.

tasks.title: Transport to the Depths
tasks.description: Are you now ready to face the next challenge?
tasks.offerText: Reach Tier 7 to face the next challenge.
tasks.acceptedText: Reach Tier 7 to face the next challenge.
tasks.activeText: Reach Tier 7 to face the next challenge.
tasks.completionText: You are ready to face the depths of Zurath.

tasks.title: Gather Shards
tasks.description: Find 15 Ashen Shards.
tasks.offerText: Find 15 Ashen Shards.
tasks.acceptedText: Find 15 Ashen Shards.
tasks.activeText: Find 15 Ashen Shards.
tasks.completionText: You have gathered 15 Ashen Shards.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.title: Turn In Shards
tasks.description: Give 15 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Give 15 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Give 15 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Give 15 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: Thank you for bringing these to me. This confirms what I feared. The corruption of Ashangal has escaped containment.

title: Rings of the Magi
description: Acquire the ancient rings to wield greater power.
offerText: Acquire the ancient rings to wield greater power. Will you accept this challenge?
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to acquire the Rings of the Magi.
activeText: Continue your journey to acquire the Rings of the Magi.
completionText: You have claimed the Rings of the Magi.

tasks.title: Acquire Band of Zu
tasks.description: Find a Band of Zu in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.offerText: Find a Band of Zu in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.acceptedText: Find a Band of Zu in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.activeText: Find a Band of Zu in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.completionText: You have acquired a Band of Zu.

tasks.title: Acquire Band of Karn
tasks.description: Find a Band of Karn in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.offerText: Find a Band of Karn in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.acceptedText: Find a Band of Karn in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.activeText: Find a Band of Karn in Zurath’s depths.
tasks.completionText: You have acquired a Band of Karn.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.title: Speak to Syliri
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have spoken with Sehnrhyx Syliri.

title: Enter Ashangal
description: Discover the entrance to the endless depths of Ashangal.
offerText: Discover the entrance to Ashangal. Will you accept this challenge?
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to enter Ashangal.
activeText: Continue your journey to discover the entrance to Ashangal.
completionText: It seems an Echo of Ashangal has led you to the entrance! The Shard of Echoes is attuned to Ashangal and will help you in further discoveries in the depths.

tasks.title: Prepare for Ashangal
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri when you are ready to enter Ashangal.
tasks.offerText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri when you are ready to enter Ashangal.
tasks.acceptedText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri when you are ready to enter Ashangal.
tasks.activeText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri when you are ready to enter Ashangal.
tasks.completionText: I used the last of the Ashen Shards to realign our portal to take you to Ashangal's doorstep!

tasks.title: Passage to the Depths
tasks.description: Locate the secret entrance on Tier 10.
tasks.offerText: Locate the secret entrance on Tier 10.
tasks.acceptedText: Locate the secret entrance on Tier 10.
tasks.activeText: Locate the secret entrance on Tier 10.
tasks.completionText: You have discovered the path.

tasks.title: Opening the Way
tasks.description: Forge the key to gain entry to Ashangal.
tasks.offerText: Forge the key to gain entry to Ashangal.
tasks.acceptedText: Forge the key to gain entry to Ashangal.
tasks.activeText: Forge the key to gain entry to Ashangal.
tasks.completionText: You have dispelled the guardian's Illusion. Enter Ashangal!

tasks.title: Deeper Descent
tasks.description: Use the secret passage to enter Ashangal.
tasks.offerText: Descend to from Zurath into Ashangal.
tasks.acceptedText: Descend to from Zurath into Ashangal.
tasks.activeText: Descend to from Zurath into Ashangal.
tasks.completionText: You have entered Ashangal.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

title: Harnessing Corruption
description: Harness the corruption to unlock new powers.
offerText: Harness the corruption to unlock new powers. Will you accept this challenge?
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to harness the corruption.
activeText: Continue your journey to harness the corruption.
completionText: You have unlocked the power of Portal Binding.

tasks.title: Enter Ashangal
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.
tasks.offerText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.
tasks.acceptedText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.
tasks.activeText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.
tasks.completionText: You have entered Ashangal.

tasks.title: Collect Shards
tasks.description: Collect 50 Ashen Shards.
tasks.offerText: Collect 50 Ashen Shards.
tasks.acceptedText: Collect 50 Ashen Shards.
tasks.activeText: Collect 50 Ashen Shards.
tasks.completionText: You have collected 50 Ashen Shards.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.title: Turn In Shards
tasks.description: Give 50 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Give 50 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Give 50 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Give 50 Ashen Shards to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: The shards have been delivered.

title: Listening for Echoes
description: Seek out the Echoes hidden within Zurath.
offerText: Seek out the Echoes hidden within Zurath. Will you accept this challenge?
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to seek out the Echoes.
activeText: Continue your journey to seek out the Echoes.
completionText: You have uncovered the secrets of the Echoes.

tasks.title: Complete Echoes
tasks.description: Complete five Echoes.
tasks.offerText: Complete five Echoes.
tasks.acceptedText: Complete five Echoes.
tasks.activeText: Complete five Echoes.
tasks.completionText: Five Echoes completed.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri to discuss the Echoes.
tasks.offerText: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri to discuss the Echoes.
tasks.acceptedText: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri to discuss the Echoes.
tasks.activeText: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri to discuss the Echoes.
tasks.completionText: You have shared the Echoes with Sehnrhyx Syliri.

title: Clad in Magic
description: Equip a full set of magic gear to wield its power.
offerText: Equip a full set of magic gear to wield its power. Will you accept this challenge?
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to equip a full set of magic gear.
activeText: Continue your journey to equip a full set of magic gear.
completionText: You are clad in magic, a true Zukarrii.

tasks.title: Continue Echoes
tasks.description: Complete five more Echoes.
tasks.offerText: Complete five more Echoes.
tasks.acceptedText: Complete five more Echoes.
tasks.activeText: Complete five more Echoes.
tasks.completionText: Five more Echoes completed.

tasks.title: Equip Magic Gear
tasks.description: Equip a full set of magic gear (amulet, dagger, wand, armor, two rings).
tasks.offerText: Equip a full set of magic gear.
tasks.acceptedText: Equip a full set of magic gear.
tasks.activeText: Equip a full set of magic gear.
tasks.completionText: You have equipped a full set of magic gear.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.offerText: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.acceptedText: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have proven your magical prowess.

title: Echoes of Zurath
description: Uncover the hidden Echoes within Zurath.
offerText: Begin your journey to uncover the Echoes of Zurath.
acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to uncover the Echoes.
activeText: Continue your journey to uncover the Echoes.
completionText: You have uncovered all Echoes within Zurath.
